frontmatter.title: What career to choose in programming
frontmatter.description: free online programming course for Practicum

projectData.task: To develop a free educational course about careers in programming that raises conversion rates into paid product up to 20%.
projectData.whyExists: As a producer and product manager at Practicum, I was tasked to develop a short marketing course.

process.title: Demand test
process.caption: To define do we need a full-blown “Intro to coding” or only career navigation

process.title: Instructional design
process.caption: With LXD, we developed the course structure. With editor, we wrote it

process.title: Writing the content
process.caption: We decided to write and version in GitHub, for we needed Markdown format

projectData.results: 43% conversion into paid courses. 3.5% end-to-end conversion into payment.
